section.title: Build the future of AI with us
section.description:
Everyone’s talking about AI Agents and MCP servers—but can you build them?
Whether you’re a pro coder or brand-new to tech, join our Hackathon to automate tasks, supercharge your data, and conquer the AI wave.
section.badgeText: Agents and MCP Hackathon, by deco.chat

section.title: What's this Hackathon about?
section.description: We're on a mission to empower everyone, from seasoned developers to complete newcomers, to create AI solutions that understand, reason, and take action.
section.mcpDescription: Model Context Protocols (MCPs) connect large language models (LLMs) to external data, tools, and APIs—massively expanding what AI can do. In essence, MCPs let your AI:
section.agentDescription: AI Agents combine powerful LLMs with reasoning and action-taking abilities. They can:

agentCapabilities.title: Act as specialized assistants for any domain
Automate multi-step tasks that require logic
Seamlessly integrate multiple data sources and tools

section.title: Who is it for?
section.description: We believe anyone can solve problems and automate work with AI—no heavy coding skills required! Our platform, deco.chat, features plug-and-play integrations and a conversational assistant that sets up Agents for you. If you're more experienced or just love to tinker, you'll have full access to our framework to build new MCPs, integrate unique data sources, and create complex Agents.

section.title: Event Format
section.description: We're bringing AI enthusiasts together from around the world for a 100% remote experience. Work at your own pace, whether you're collaborating with a global team or going solo. Submit your project asynchronously before the final deadline, and you'll be in the running for prizes.

section.title: Frequently Asked Questions
section.description: Have questions about the hackathon? Find answers to common queries below. Still have questions? Join our Discord or email hackathon@deco.cx.

faqs.question: Do I need prior AI experience?
faqs.answer: Not at all—this Hackathon has everything you need to get started.

faqs.question: Can I join alone or must I form a team?
faqs.answer: You can fly solo or team up—whichever you prefer.

faqs.question: What exactly are MCPs and AI Agents?
faqs.answer: They’re frameworks that let you build advanced, context-aware AI solutions (see details above).

faqs.question: How will I get support?
faqs.answer: We have scheduled Office Hours plus mentors on Discord for questions.

faqs.question: Which programming languages can I use?
faqs.answer: JavaScript or TypeScript are ideal, but any language calling MCP APIs works.

faqs.question: What happens to projects after the Hackathon?
faqs.answer: They remain yours. We encourage you to keep building and even showcase them in our Agent Catalog.

faqs.question: Do I need a powerful computer?
faqs.answer: A normal setup is fine. The heavy lifting happens in the cloud.
